name: Luc Valencia
text: You can not find examples, because there is none: he and his death squads only targeted the small guys, i.e. petty criminals. I did extensive search also and could not find any concrete example that he was instrumental in dismantling an organized crime group or a terrorist cell. He has cultivated a personal myth that only adoring gullible admirers can believe. As you said, talk is cheap.
